page.title: 05MAIN FARMING TYPES
page.content: The East is used as permanent grassland for{dairy and beef cattle. There are also some Smallholdings of land used by{market gardeners. }The produce is sold in farm shops and on Ashton Market. {Deer}are kept by one farmer in Daisynook but in the Woodhouses area {pigs}are the main concern. This is one of the most intensive pig fattening areas in the North. There are over{20,000}pigs in the area. Main reasons for this are the huge amounts of waste food available (increased by the "sell by dates" on most food products) and the huge local market for pork and bacon products. Most farmers in the area are contract farmers who sell to {WALLS}who have a factory nearby. Recent problems with smells have been reduced by using new equipment to boil food.
